verses.verse: Dead <S%H4194><s%> <S%H2070>flies<s%> cause the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer<s%> to send <S%H5042>forth<s%> an evil <S%H887>odor<s%>; so doth a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5531>folly<s%> <S%H3368>outweigh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
A wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>; but a <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> at his <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Yea <S%H5530>also<s%>, when the fool <S%H1980>walketh<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, his <S%H3820>understanding<s%> <S%H2638>faileth<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and he saith to every one that he is a <S%H5530>fool<s%>.

If the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> rise <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3240>thee<s%>, leave not thy <S%H4725>place<s%>; for <S%H4832>gentleness<s%> <S%H3240>allayeth<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2399>offences<s%>.

There <S%H3426>is<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, as it were an <S%H7684>error<s%> which <S%H3318>proceedeth<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7989>ruler<s%>:
folly <S%H5529><s%> is <S%H5414>set<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4791>dignity<s%>, and the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in a low <S%H8216>place<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> like <S%H5650>servants<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He that <S%H2658>diggeth<s%> a <S%H1475>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into <S%H6555>it<s%>; and whoso breaketh through a <S%H1447>wall<s%>, a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shall bite <S%H5391>him<s%>.
Whoso heweth <S%H5265>out<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be <S%H6087>hurt<s%> <S%H1234>therewith<s%>; and he that cleaveth <S%H6086>wood<s%> is endangered <S%H5533>thereby<s%>.

If the <S%H1270>iron<s%> be <S%H6949>blunt<s%>, and one do not <S%H7043>whet<s%> the <S%H6440>edge<s%>, then must he <S%H1396>put<s%> to more <S%H2428>strength<s%>: but <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H3504>profitable<s%> to <S%H3787>direct<s%>.
If the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5391>bite<s%> before it is <S%H3908>charmed<s%>, then is there no <S%H3504>advantage<s%> in the <S%H3956>charmer<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H2580>gracious<s%>; but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> will swallow up <S%H1104>himself<s%>.

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H5531>foolishness<s%>; and the <S%H319>end<s%> of his <S%H6310>talk<s%> is <S%H7451>mischievous<s%> <S%H1948>madness<s%>.

A <S%H5530>fool<s%> also <S%H7235>multiplieth<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>: yet <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not what shall <S%H310>be<s%>; and that which shall be after <S%H5046>him<s%>, who can tell him?
The <S%H5999>labor<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H3021>wearieth<s%> every one of <S%H3045>them<s%>; for he knoweth not how to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
Woe <S%H337><s%> to <S%H776>thee<s%>, O land, when thy <S%H4428>king<s%> is a <S%H5288>child<s%>, and thy <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>!

Happy <S%H835><s%> art <S%H776>thou<s%>, O land, when thy <S%H4428>king<s%> is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, and thy <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>, for <S%H1369>strength<s%>, and not for <S%H8358>drunkenness<s%>!
By <S%H6103>slothfulness<s%> the <S%H4746>roof<s%> <S%H4355>sinketh<s%> <S%H8220>in<s%>; and through idleness of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1811>leaketh<s%>.
A <S%H3899>feast<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H7814>laughter<s%>, and <S%H3196>wine<s%> maketh <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H3701>life<s%>; and money answereth all <S%H6030>things<s%>.

Revile <S%H7043><s%> not the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H4093>no<s%>, not in thy thought; and <S%H7043>revile<s%> not the <S%H6223>rich<s%> in thy <S%H2315>bedchamber<s%>: for a <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H3212>carry<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and that which <S%H1167>hath<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>.
